BBEX3.A.OMR.USD.CA.AB.A04: Exchange rates for the US dollar in Oman / USD 1 = OMR ... (selling)
General: The Rial Omani is pegged to the US dollar.
Source: Central Bank of Oman, Muscat

Comment on 1986: On 27 January 1986, the official exchange rates (buying/selling rate) for the US dollar were changed from USD 1 = OMR 0.34505 / 0.34574 to USD 1 = OMR 0.3840 / 0.3850, corresponding to a depreciation of the rial Omani against the US dollar of 10.2% (middle rate). Annual averages calculated on the basis of month-end exchange rates.
